scripts.testStream: ffmpeg -f avfoundation -pix_fmt uyvy422 -framerate 30 -i "0:none" -vf "fps=fps=23.976,format=rgba" -bitrate 8000k -video_size 640x480 -f mpegts -codec:v mpeg1video http://localhost:3001/stream
scripts.testStreamDesktop: ffmpeg -f avfoundation -pix_fmt uyvy422 -framerate 30 -i "1:none" -vf "fps=fps=23.976,format=rgba" -bitrate 8000k -video_size 640x480 -f mpegts -codec:v mpeg1video http://localhost:3001/stream
